Hydras:

Hydras trasnmormed in dragon and spat fire against Tylrael. That was 
all his answer


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael intensified his shield of light as more and more shots came 
at him.
> 
> Tyrael: Fools! Hydras, you do not even have the guts to fight me 
like
> the leader you pretend to be!  Would you risk all the credibility 
you
> have in front of your crew?  Will you prove yourself weak?
> 
> He sent eight light spears at his nemesis.
> 
> Dreadplague, on her part, could not dodge the shots from Perceptor. 
No
> matter, she struck twice at the Predacons, not worrying about her 
own
> wounds. She also brought more and more fear in the mind of her 
opponent.
> 
> The Dragoon, though, saw that things were going quite well. Even
> though in smaller number, the Tripredacus were fighting well. It was
> his time now to push the Predacons back.
> 
> He looked for a good target. He found it in Thrust, Terpa and
> Bumblebee, and fired a massive fireball at the group.
